devdoc.author: Julien Niset - <julien@argent.im>
devdoc.details: Registry of authorised modules. Modules must be registered before they can be authorised on a wallet.

changeOwner(address).details: Lets the owner transfer ownership of the contract to a new owner.

isRegisteredModule(address).details: Checks if a module is registered.
isRegisteredModule(address).return: true if the module is registered.

isRegisteredModule(address[]).details: Checks if a list of modules are registered.
isRegisteredModule(address[]).return: true if all the modules are registered.

isRegisteredUpgrader(address).details: Checks if an upgrader is registered.
isRegisteredUpgrader(address).return: true if the upgrader is registered.

moduleInfo(address).details: Gets the name of a module from its address.

recoverToken(address).details: Utility method enbaling the owner of the registry to claim any ERC20 token that was sent to the registry.

params._name: The unique name of the module.
The unique name of the upgrader.

upgraderInfo(address).details: Gets the name of an upgrader from its address.

devdoc.title: ModuleRegistry
